nodes.bodyText:
Nitpick: Please move this line with other _APIs instance creations, it will improve the readability. It's not bad but for example, in the case of StatesAPI on line 95, I need to look where does this taskomaticApi instance come from.
We could even inline taskomaticApi instance if it is being used only once in the class and that a parameter of StatesAPI 's constructor.

The naming is a bit confusing here. Everything above line 90 are general instances independent of WebAPI/UI while everything below are http endpoints where *API means api endpoints only and *Controller are usually api/ui endpoints.
I think we either need to make the distinction clearer or get rid of it.
